Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ReloadTime = 0.5 ReloadAmmoTime = 5
Meshes = { BowWithArrow = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=172088844", Bow = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=172088882", Arrow = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=172088909" }
Grips = { BowWithArrow = CFrame.new(0, -0.4, 0.415, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), Bow = CFrame.new(0, -0.4, 0.325, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("FireSound"), Hit = Handle:WaitForChild("HitSound") }
Speed = 50
Gravity = 196.2
Damage = 12
Tool.Enabled = true Tool.Grip = Grips.BowWithArrow Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.BowWithArrow
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Arrow = Instance.new("Part") Arrow.Name = "Arrow" Arrow.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Arrow.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Arrow.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Arrow.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Arrow.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Arrow.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 1.25) ArrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") ArrowMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh ArrowMesh.MeshId = Meshes.Arrow ArrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=172088944" ArrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) ArrowMesh.Parent = Arrow ArrowSound = Sounds.Hit:Clone() ArrowSound.Parent = Arrow
ArrowsShot = 0 ArrowStock = 15
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "Fire" and Tool.Enabled then local TargetInFront = math.acos((Value - Handle.Position).unit:Dot(Handle.CFrame.lookVector)) if TargetInFront > (math.pi / 3) then return end if ArrowsShot >= ArrowStock then ArrowsShot = 0 Tool.Enabled = false InvokeClient(Player, "PlayAnimation", nil) wait(ReloadAmmoTime) Tool.Enabled = true return end ArrowsShot = (ArrowsShot + 1) Tool.Enabled = false Tool.Grip = Grips.Bow Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.Bow Sounds.Fire:Play() local ArrowClone = Arrow:Clone() local HitDebounce = false local FireArrow = math.random(1, 20) local Fire if FireArrow == 1 then Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Parent = ArrowClone end ArrowClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or HitDebounce or Hit.Name == "Arrow" then return end if Hit.Parent == Character or Hit.Parent.Parent == Character then return end HitDebounce = true ArrowClone.HitSound:Play() local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Hit Weld.Part1 = ArrowClone local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(((not Fire and Damage) or 65)) local StickCFrame = CFrame.new(Hit.CFrame.p, ArrowClone.Position) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -1) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), (math.random() * math.pi * 2), 0) Weld.C1 = StickCFrame:inverse() * Hit.CFrame else Weld.C1 = ArrowClone.CFrame:inverse() * Hit.CFrame end Weld.Parent = ArrowClone ArrowClone.CanCollide = false end) local Direction = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, Value) local Mass = (ArrowClone:GetMass() * Gravity) local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyGyro.Parent = ArrowClone local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Direction.lookVector * Speed BodyVelocity.Parent = ArrowClone ArrowClone.Velocity = BodyVelocity.velocity Debris:AddItem(ArrowClone, 5) ArrowClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") ArrowClone.CFrame = Handle.CFrame + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (ArrowClone.Size.Z / 2)) ArrowClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(ArrowClone.Position, Value) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Grip = Grips.BowWithArrow Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.BowWithArrow Tool.Enabled = true end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Mode, Value) end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
function Unequipped()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Reload = Tool:WaitForChild("Reload")
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 then ReloadAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Reload) if ReloadAnim then ReloadAnim:Play() end end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Fire", Mouse.Hit.p) end) end
function Unequipped() if ReloadAnim then ReloadAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
